title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 214.10 - Commission access to records and assessment authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 214.10 - Commission access to records and assessment authority

State Regulations

An Authorized Sanctioning Entity's books and records shall be
available to the Commission for review and copying at any time and without
limitation. The Commission and its authorized representatives shall be entitled
to attend any match, exhibition or weigh-in overseen or conducted by an
authorized sanctioning entity at any time and without limitation for the
purpose of observing and assessing compliance with the laws of the State of New

York and the rules, policies, and directives of the Commission. An Authorized

Sanctioning Entity shall fully cooperate with any inquiries or inspections
conducted by the Commission. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
